response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, I understand its true worth to be $1,500,000. However, considering the current market conditions and aiming to achieve a mutually beneficial agreement, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value, providing you with an excellent return on investment. I trust this proposal will meet your expectations and aligns well with your financial planning. Should you require any further information or discuss the details, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
